text: Macintosh Repair & Upgrade Secrets is a hardback book for repairing and upgrading Apple Macintosh personal computers from the Macintosh 128K to Macintosh SE models. The book was written by Larry Pina and is out of print. It was first published in 1990 by Hayden Books, with . == See also == * Larry Pina Category:Computer books Category:Macintosh internals Category:Books by Larry Pina
title: Macintosh Repair & Upgrade Secrets
